name: Futa TakerPOV Blowjob LoRA
description:
A LoRA for creating photorealistic Futa TakerPOV blowjob images.

"Fuck"-Version here: Futa TakerPOV Fuck + Cum LoRA

If you feel like supporting my work, please consider visiting my Patreon to get access to more detailed instructions on how to get the most out of my models and have a say in what's up next: Link.

Update: Version 2 was trained with adjusted training settings and is less overfittet. Image quality should be much better now.

This one is pretty straight forward to use.

Use 'takerpovbj' as the general trigger.

'Close up', 'extreme close up', 'looking up' and 'looking ahead' are used to control the perspective, but you don't need to use any of them.

Also reacts well to 'small/medium/big/huge breasts'.

It was also trained to react to 'grabbing you', but I didn't have much luck prompting for it.

Something to work out with the next version.

That's about it. Looking forward to seeing what you can make with it!

Recommended strength is around 0.7-0.8.

Based on UberRealisticPornMerge

If you like this, you may also like my other LoRAs.
